TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PeerEndPoint extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerEndPoint Implements IDisposable, IEquatable(Of PeerEndPoint), ISerializable
type PeerEndPoint = class interface IDisposable interface IEquatable<PeerEndPoint> interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示 或 实例的位置，该位置由唯一网络地址配置通过描述对等协作基础结构中的 或 的当前实例进行指定。

span.span: Represents the location of a , or instance specified with a unique network address configuration by describing the current instance of a or within the Peer-to-Peer Collaboration Infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等"终结点"用于描述联系人的所在位置-描述在对等协作网络中的联系人当前可用的实例的唯一网络地址配置。A peer "endpoint" describes a contact's presence location — the unique network address configuration that describes the currently available instance of the contact within the peer collaboration network. 单个联系人可以同时存在于对等协作网络中的多个终结点。A single contact can be available at multiple endpoints within the peer collaboration network. 监视联系人的对等方可以查询特定对等方状态、 应用程序或对象更新该联系人与关联的终结点。A peer watching a contact can query any of the endpoints associated with that contact for specific peer presence, application, or object updates.

summary.span: 生成 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Generates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数提供开发人员已知道的 IP 地址的事件中他们要联系。This constructor is provided in the event a developer already knows the IP address of the they wish to contact. 利用此构造函数可生成显式实例，从而有助于创建反过来又用于与使用对等协作基础结构由 IP 地址标识的对等进行交互的类实例。Utilizing this constructor to generate an explicit instance facilitates the creation of a class instance that can in turn be used to interact with the peer identified by an IP address, using the Peer Collaboration Infrastructure.

summary.span: 设置此属性值后，将在创建特定 的线程上为因异步操作而未激发的所有事件回调关联的事件处理程序。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值是`null`，它指示系统线程池线程上调用所有事件处理程序。The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread. 此属性通常设置为 UI 元素如实例。This property is typically set to a UI element such as a instance.
